description: Maharagama Urban Council  and  others Vs Assistant Labour Commissioner. District Labour Office,  Maharagama   and  others before Hon.Wickum A. Kaluarachchi, J.
parties: Maharagama Urban Council  and  others Vs Assistant Labour Commissioner. District Labour Office,  Maharagama   and  others
keywords: Issue of maintainability of the writ application. -Certificate under Section 38(2) of the Employees Provident Fund Act. -Not choosing the option of challenging the correctness of the certificate in a proper forum. -Waiving off of the right to challenge a certificate under Section 38(2) of the Employees Provident Fund Act. -Correctness of any statement in a certificate under Section 38(2) cannot be challenged in the Magistrate’s Court proceedings. -Laches. -Abuse of the process of law.
legistation: -Article 140 of the Constitution. -Section 38 (2) and 38 (3) of the Employees Provident Fund Act No. 15 of 1958.
